name: Averte Oculi
description:
Averte Oculi You have been interested in ancient civilisation and their mythology. When you have found one of their underground labyrinth you knew you have to explore it. And so your dangerous trip begins...

  Go through all of the rooms. Complete each one by collecting all of the ancient coins. Beware of the Wandering Roots. They are quite often used by this civilisation, to defend their dungeons. Confused travellers have to depend on their memory of current room.

Controls
  • MOVEMENT - WASD/Arrow Keys: Move all the way to the nearest wall or on the place with a coin/Wandering Root
  • LOOK - Space: Look where you have end up after crossing over a Wandering Root. Unfortunetly you cant move afterwards so you have to restart.
  • RESTART - R: Restarts a level
